title: eBay invests $300k in Refiberd to drive circular fashion solutions
body: Bay is investing $300,000 into Refiberd in its ongoing efforts to support fashion startups through its global Circular Fashion Fund program.

title: eBay invests $300k in Refiberd to boost circular fashion with AI
body: eBay hopes the investment will enhance the reach of Refiberd's advanced AI system, which can identify the composition of textiles to ensure proper sorting and recycling. Refiberd uses its ...
